name: Streaming Link
description: A telegram bot to genrate direct streaming links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the telegram media

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: Set to 'True' if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: Whether to use service accounts or not. For this to work see 'Using service accounts' section readme file in repo

INDEX_URL.description: Refer to https://github.com/maple3142/GDIndex/ The URL should not have any trailing '/'
